summary: Deep investigation of crash issue. Restored frontend files from git commit 9ed9c72. Fixed LanguageToast i18n import path. Added pt-24 padding to Hero section for fixed header. Build successful. All components exist at root level (Hero.tsx, NewGallery.tsx, Collaboration.tsx, About.tsx, Header.tsx, Footer.tsx, LanguageToast.tsx). Dev server restarted.
current_status: Frontend restored from backup. All import paths fixed. Hero section has proper padding. Build successful. Dev server running on port 5173. Website should display correctly with hero section visible.
